title: Senior AR Software Engineer - Apple Vision Pro
summary: Apple is where individual imaginations gather together, committing to the values that lead to great work...
description: The ideal candidate for this role is driven by a need to explore how the intersection of hardware and software engineering can empower novel methods of human expression...
key_qualifications: Extensive track record of building and shipping complex applications or user facing systems on consumer platforms, Strong command of object-oriented programming (C / C++ / Obj-C / Swift preferred), Extensive knowledge of application software design principles, Demonstrated technical leadership in building and shipping high quality software, Demonstrated ability to communication and collaborate across team boundaries
education_experience: BS/MS in Computer Science or related field with 3+ years of relevant industry experience
additional_requirements: Released API based on modern design principles to other engineering teams (preferred), Experience with recommendation systems is a plus, Experience with computer vision frameworks and multi-modal ML systems is a plus
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $175,800 and $312,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location....
